title: Point-to-Point Speeding Cameras on Highways
subtitle: Rumor: States are installing 'point-to-point' cameras along highways that automatically track and ticket speeding motorists based on the amount of time it takes them to travel between two checkpoints.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: States are installing ‘point-to-point’ cameras along highways that automatically track and ticket speeders based on the amount of time it takes them to travel between two checkpoints.
